DataDelivery.title: Delivery
DataDelivery.text1: Ideological considerations of a higher order, as well as the strengthening and development of the structure, allows us to carry out important tasks in developing a personnel training system that meets pressing needs. Thus, the beginning of the daily work of position formation entails the process of introducing and modernizing the positions taken by the participants in relation to the assigned tasks.
